drinks.name: margarita
drinks.description: Prepare a Margarita by rimming a glass with salt, shaking tequila, fresh lime juice, triple sec, and simple syrup with ice, straining it into the glass, and garnishing with a lime wedge before enjoying responsibly.

drinks.name: Sex on the beach
drinks.description: Mix vodka, peach schnapps, cranberry juice, and orange juice in a shaker, strain into a glass over ice, garnish with an orange slice, and enjoy responsibly.

drinks.name: Scooby Snack Shot
drinks.description: Combine Coconut Rum, Melon Liqueur, and Pineapple juice in a shaker with ice. Shake well and strain into a shot glass. Top with a dollop of Whipped Cream and sprinkle Coconut Flakes on top. Enjoy responsibly.

drinks.name: Mojito
drinks.description: Muddle fresh mint leaves and simple syrup in a glass. Add lime juice and white rum. Fill the glass with ice and top with club soda. Garnish with a lime wedge and a sprig of mint. Stir and enjoy.

drinks.name: Jagerbomb Shot
drinks.description: Drop a shot of J채germeister into a glass of energy drink, and consume quickly for an energizing experience.

drinks.name: Lemon Drop Shot
drinks.description: Dip the rim of the shot glass in sugar. Mix vodka, lemon juice, and simple syrup in a shaker with ice. Strain into the sugar-rimmed glass. Garnish with a lemon twist and enjoy.

drinks.name: Green Tea Shot
drinks.description: Mix Jameson Irish Whiskey and Peach Schnapps in a shaker with ice. Add a splash of sour mix and shake. Strain into a shot glass. It's called 'Green Tea' due to its color, not its flavor!

drinks.name: Motor Oil Shot
drinks.description: Layer Peppermint Schnapps and J채germeister in a shot glass. The combination creates a visually striking effect resembling motor oil. Shoot it responsibly!

drinks.name: Alligator Shot
drinks.description: Layer Melon Liqueur and Sour Apple Schnapps in a shot glass. The two layers create a unique visual effect resembling an alligator's coloration. Enjoy this fun shot!
